name: Vulpix

passive.name: Playful Fire
passive.effect: When you discard any Energies, you may attach a Fire Energy to any Pokemon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

flavor: If it is attacked by an enemy stronger than itself, it will feign injury to fool it and escape.
